name: WADE BENCH
description: Spacious drawers and a convenient seating area make the Wade Bench ideal for any entryway, but it can be utilized in all rooms of the home. The archive contains FBX, OBJ, MAX files for Corona 1.7 (PRB) and VRAY 3.6 (Microfacet GTR / GGX) renderers. Render is made in Corona render. Who works in the V-Ray version is lower than 3.1. Be careful, the materials in the BRDF section are Microfaset GTR (GGX), if your version is older than 3.1, then the BRDF field will be empty. Choose Blinn, Phong or Ward - which is preferable for you. For Corona render, it is recommended to put version no lower than 1.5, since the glossiness of materials is adjusted to the PBR. Show more
short_description:
Platform:	 3dsMax 2011 + fbx
Render:	 Vray+Corona
Size:	 47 MB
Style:	 Ethnic
Materials:	 Wood, Leather
